article.Heading: Budget 2017: Here's a wishlist of jewellery industry
article.Summary: Watch the interview of Somasundaram PR, MD-India of World Gold Council with Manisha Gupta on CNBC-TV18. He spoke about what exactly the jewellery industry is expecting from the Finance Minister in this Budget.
article.Body: Watch the interview of Somasundaram PR, MD-India of World Gold Council with Manisha Gupta on CNBC-TV18. He spoke about what exactly the jewellery industry is expecting from the Finance Minister in this Budget.
